nodes.text: The Naboo Airforce was an organization associated with the Human Naboo population of the planet Naboo. One of their bases was the Harte Secur Airbase, located southwest of the city Harte Secur. Some of the most skilled pilots on Naboo resided there.

During the Invasion of Naboo by the Trade Federation in 32 BBY, a reconaissance briefing to the Droid Army commander OOM-9 warned that the Naboo Airforce was not to be trifled with. The briefing also recommended that the droid destroy the Harte Secur Airbase after retrieving a droid control program that the Naboo had stolen. Several starfighters from the base later attacked OOM-9's forces at his camp, but were destroyed by baron battle droids.

The Naboo Airforce was mentioned in the reconnaissance briefing of "Behind the Lines," the second level of the Trade Federation campaign in the 2001 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds.
